project_path.synthetix: contracts/Iosiro-Synthetix Mizar Release Smart Contract Audit/synthetix

findings.title: Incorrect debt calculation
findings.description: The original implementation only considered the local network's total number of debt shares, when it should have used the oracle value that combined the values from both L1 and L2 deployments.
